headline.main: Chinese in Burma in Counter-Drive; Push Foe Across Yunnan Frontier; CHINESE IN BURMA IN COUNTER-ATTACK

lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, April 1 -- The Chinese defenders of Southern Yunnan have repulsed all Japanese attempts to drive into the province and are counter-attacking the enemy on Burmese soil, the Chinese High Command announced tonight.
abstract: Chinese repel Jap efforts to drive into Yunnan by attacks on Burmese soil; Japanese reptd fleeing Leichun-Huang area; Chinese attack Moshanpu and Shihshow; battle rages, Owchihkow; Chinese puppet troops reptd to have deserted to Chinese guerrillas, Likowyi; Chinese fliers down 2 of 14 Jap planes raiding Hengyang
snippet: CHUNGKING, China, April 1 -- The Chinese defenders of Southern Yunnan have repulsed all Japanese attempts to drive into the province and are counter-attacking the enemy on Burmese soil, the Chinese High Command announced tonight....
